title: Wow
body:
Im done. Im so F*** Done. Why the hell do you make it so hard to get from Silver 1 to Gold V. What the hell am I getting matched up with. What the hell riot I cant even get the hell out of this shit rank during promos. 2 Fu.. promos both lost what the hell. I cant climb out of the shit you match me with. Please fix this garbage ass ranking system. Silvers vs 3 golds and 2 silvers. What the hell thanks for the joyride
{{item:3070}}

replies.body: I verse plats and im bronze, life isn't fair.
